00010 #ifndef __CONFIG_H__
00011 #define __CONFIG_H__
00012 
00013 typedef int Int32;
00014 typedef unsigned int UInt32;
00015 
00016 typedef unsigned int UInt;
00017 typedef unsigned char Byte;
00018 
00019 #include <assert.h>
00020 #define ASSERT(exp) assert(exp)
00021 
00022 #ifdef _DEBUG
00023 #define NODEFAULT default: ASSERT(0); break;
00024 #elif _MSC_VER >= 1200
00025 #define NODEFAULT default: ASSERT(0); __assume(0); break;
00026 #else
00027 #define NODEFAULT default: break;
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 #ifdef _DEBUG
00031 extern int dbgprintf(const char*, ...);
00032 typedef struct _VALUE* Value;
00033 extern void dbgPrintOneValue(Value v, int depth);
00034 #define TRACE dbgprintf
00035 #define TRACEVALUE dbgPrintOneValue
00036 #else
00037 inline void TRACE(char*, ...) { }
00038 #define TRACEVALUE(Value, int) { }
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #define ARRAYSIZE(x) (sizeof(x) / sizeof(x[0]))
00042 
00043 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00044  #ifdef NSRT_BUILD
00045   #define EXPORT __declspec(dllexport) extern
00046  #else
00047   #define EXPORT __declspec(dllimport) extern
00048  #endif
00049 #else
00050   #define EXPORT extern
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #ifdef WIN32
00054  #include <malloc.h>
00055  #define ALLOCA _alloca
00056  #include <stdlib.h>
00057  #define SWAB _swab
00058  #include <tchar.h>
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #endif //__CONFIG_H__
